# Organize data

```{r}
  grav <-
    grav %>%
    dplyr::select(-units) %>%
    tidyr::spread(var, val) %>%
    dplyr::rename("firepower" = "fp") %>%
    dplyr::left_join(dplyr::select(data, id, co_ef, firepower, ssa), by = c("firepower", "id"))
```
